title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two subjects from the following: Economics, Geography, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and one of Geography, Economics/Chemistry

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two subjects from the following: Economics, Geography, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and one of Geography, Economics/Chemistry

title: FISHERIES TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultura Science and any one of the following: Physics, Economics or Further Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Economics.

title: HYDROLOGY & WATER RESOURCES MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
i. Five (5) ordinary credit pass at SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two (2) sittings which must include English, Mathematics, physics or Geography and any other two (2) Science subjects plus at least pass in Chemistry and Biology.

ii. Five credit pass in NBTE recognised preliminary National Diploma (ND) course offered in a college of Agriculture or similar post secondary. Technical institution. The credit pass must include Mathematics, Geography and physics.

title: INDUSTRIAL & LABOUR RELATIONS
utme_requirements: Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Pass in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than (2) sittings in English Language, Mathematics, and other three (3) of Economics/Commerce, Government/Bookkeeping/Accounting, Literature in English or Teachers Grade II Certificate at Merit Level in Five (5) relevant subjects including Mathematics and English Language
subjects: English Language, Government, Economics/Commerce and Literature in English

title: MARINE ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5)  SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one of: Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Biology/Agricultural Science, Basic Electronics, Metal Work, Wood Work and Geography obtained at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry

title: MARITIME TRANSPORT & BUSINESS STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and one (1) other subject from: Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Economics, Statistics/Technical Drawing, Auto-Mechanics, Metal Work and any other relevant:

National Technical Certificate (NTC) with credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and Mechanical Trade areas.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and one (1) other subject from: Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Economics, Statistics/Technical Drawing, Auto-Mechanics, Metal Work and any other relevant:

National Technical Certificate (NTC) with credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and Mechanical Trade areas.

title: NAUTICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Geography and any one of: Chemistry, Technical Drawing and Economics/Commerce obtained at not more than two sittings and any other qualification considered relevant by the Academic Board.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Geography

title: OCEANOGRAPHY & FISHERIES SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
I. Five (5) ordinary credit pass at SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings which must include English, Mathematics, Chemistry and any two other subjects.

ii. Five credit pass in relevant subjects obtained at final examination of an NBTE recognised preliminary ND programme offered in a college of Agriculture or similar post secondary Technical Institutions such students must have Olevel WASC, SSCE, or GCE Pass in Biology/Agricultural Science, Geography, Chemstry, Mathematics and English Language.

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other two (2) subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science, and one (1) subject from Economics, Commerce, Further Mathematics, Geography, Computer Studies and Technical Drawing.

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) Ordinary Level Credit Passes in SSCE/GCE/NECO/NABTEB obtained at not more than two sittings in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other two (2) subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science, and one (1) subject from Economics, Commerce, Further Mathematics, Geography, Computer Studies and Technical Drawing.
